titleStmt.title: [A Mo]st excellent ballad of S. George for England and the kings daugh[ter of] Ægyipt, whom he delivered from death, and how he slew a mighty dragon. The tune is Flying fame.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and W. Gilbertson.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: sheet torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
